MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW3 postcode area of Buerton, affecting properties in Festival Ave, Windmill Lane, Woore Road and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.20am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a grounded line towards Ravens Bank. In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 12midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.13am on 13th of March 2021.
